The platform does NOT rely on a single dashboard for all users.
Each role has its own dedicated dashboard with features relevant to its permissions.
Admin Dashboard: Full access to user management, content moderation, course control, events, chats, marketplace, leagues, and analytics.
Instructor Dashboard: Tools for managing courses, publishing lessons, viewing student progress, and handling live classes.
Moderator Dashboard: Specialized panel for message reviewing, event moderation, blog approval, and handling reports.
League Manager Dashboard: Tools for managing teams, linking GitHub repositories, publishing tasks, and tracking progress.
Seller Dashboard: For users selling items in the marketplace (product management, orders, stock, etc.).
Standard User Dashboard: Simplified panel showing learning progress, badges, saved problems, events, blogs, and personal timeline.
